text: Az mijoni sumo kasone, ki zanonasonro zihr (monand kardani jake az uzvhoi zan ʙo uzvi modar, ki nav'e az qasam ast) mekunand, ʙidonand, ki zanonason modaronason nestand, modaronason faqat zanone hastand, ki onhoro zoidaand va suxane nopisandu duruƣ ast, ki megujand. Va Xudo az gunoh on darguzaranda ast va ʙaxsojanda ast
